info.title: Joanie API
info.description: This is the Joanie API schema.

parameters.name: ordering

primary key for the record as UUID

post.description:
Generates the orders of the batch order when the state is completed exclusively.
Once all orders are generated, the task will send the email with the voucher codes
to the batch order's owner.

schema.description: primary key for the record as UUID

post.description:
Sends an email to the batch order owner with the invitation signature link to sign
the contract.

schema.description: primary key for the record as UUID

post.description: Validates the payment for the batch order if its state is in `signing` or `pending`

schema.description: primary key for the record as UUID

get.description:
Checks whether the Celery task for generating certificates is in progress or completed.
If cached data is found, it indicates that the generation process is ongoing. Otherwise,
it signifies that the task has been completed or has not been requested.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description:
* `draft` - Draft
* `assigned` - Assigned
* `to_save_payment_method` - To save payment method
* `to_sign` - To sign
* `signing` - Signing
* `pending` - Pending
* `canceled` - Canceled
* `pending_payment` - Pending payment
* `failed_payment` - Failed payment
* `no_payment` - No payment
* `completed` - Completed
* `refunding` - Refunding
* `refunded` - Refunded
* `to_own` - To own

id.description: primary key for the record as UUID

state.description:
The state of the course carrying information on what to display on a course glimpse.

The game is to find the highest priority state for this course among
its course runs and its products.

AdminOfferingRuleCreate.description:
Admin Serializer for OfferingRule model reserved to create action.

Unlike `AdminOfferingRuleSerializer`, it allows to pass a product to create
the offering rule. You can also add a discount.

Admin serializer for Offering Rule reserved for partial update and update actions.

It allows to update the field discount of an offering rule.
